parsed.internal_thinking:
I have placed my first settlement on Node 20, which provides a strong foundation of Wood (11), Brick (6), and Sheep (8). This gives me a total of 12 pips and covers the essential resources for early road building and expansion. My strategy for the second settlement will be to secure a reliable source of Wheat and Ore, ideally targeting the high-yield clusters around Hexes 14, 15, 17, or 18 (e.g., Nodes 43 or 42).

For my starting road, I am choosing the path from Node 20 to Node 10. This direction is strategically superior because Node 10 is a high-yield spot (11 pips: B6, S8, W12) and, more importantly, it leads directly toward the 3:1 port at Node 9. Given my high production of Brick and Sheep, having early access to a port will be vital for trading for Wheat and Ore if I am blocked from high-yield spots in the second round. Node 19 is also an option, but Node 10's proximity to the port and higher pip count makes it the preferred expansion route. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Current: Node 20 (W11, B6, S8). Goal: Secure Wheat and Ore in the second placement. Primary targets: Node 43 (Wh9/Wh6/Wh9 - 13 pips) or Node 42 (Wh9/O5/Wh9 - 12 pips). Road plan: Expand from Node 10 toward the 3:1 port at Node 9.
parsed.say_outloud: Setting up my road towards the north to keep my options open. That 6-Brick and 8-Sheep should help me get some early momentum!
